channel.title: Project-C✘R
channel.description:
[center][img]http://img62.imageshack.us/img62/7200/projectcxr.png[/img][/center] [size=36pt]THE BETA VERSION IS NOW AVAILABLE TO PLAY! JUST GOING TO GET A MODERATORS APPROVAL FOR THE LINK![/size] [center] [code]Version Log 1.0 - Fixed numerous bugs, added a few commands and fixed stability. 1.5 - Added Loyalty Titles and loyalty shop, added a few new items and edited a few weapons. 2.0 - Added Polypore Staff %70, Need to add the GFX and fix up the attack styles. [/code] [center][size=18pt]Goals[/size] -Add Polypore %70- -Loyalty Titles %75- -Summoning Familiars %85- -Finish Website %85- [/center] [size=24pt]Quick Link Menu[/size]
[ul][li][iurl=#introduction]Introduction[/iurl][/li] [li][iurl=#aboutus]About Us[/iurl][/li] [li][iurl=#media]Media[/iurl][/li] [li][iurl=#staff]Staff List[/iurl][/li] [li][iurl=#features]Features[/iurl][/li] [li][iurl=#template]Application Template[/iurl][/li] [li][iurl=#message]Message To Flamers and Haters[/iurl][/li] [li][iurl=#contact]Contact Methods[/iurl][/li] [li][iurl=#contact]Coder Position Requirements[/iurl][/li][/ul]
[/center]
[center][anchor=introduction][b]Introduction[/b][/center] Were back! I am currently in need of a team to work on a new private server, shortnamed Project-C✘R. Information about the shortname and what it stands for will be released later in time. Media will be added soon when I finish fixing a few bugs in the server. For now, Im gathering a team The team will consist of the following: 2x Website Designers 2x Graphical Effects artists 2x Server Programmers/Coders Any skill not mentioned here you can try to apply for (Please do not apply for in-game staff[Forum staff applications may be accepted]) The server is based on distant project insanity, 317 of course. We are currently far into our project, pretty unreal since theres only 2 coders including me. We have 614 items with working specs and animations. We have 11,257 NPCs in total with all working animations and gfx and attack styles. [center][b] [anchor=aboutus]About Us[/b][/center] [quote="Whackatre"]Details? Pictures? What are you going to do besides manage everyone and collect money?[/quote] Ha! This is highly false seeing how I am not in charge of the PayPal account, I will maintain the accounts and show users proof I am not extracting any for personal expenses. We have a separate PayPal account for Staff Expenses. There is a page located on our website which has copies of all PayPal Account Logs so our users can see that there is no profit made for us to waste around on things.
[center][anchor=media][img]http://img832.imageshack.us/img832/8135/mediax.png[/img] [img]http://img263.imageshack.us/img263/7391/torvadungeoneering.png[/img] [img]http://img213.imageshack.us/img213/4527/strykewyrms.png[/img] [img]http://img408.imageshack.us/img408/3245/shopsx.png[/img] [img]http://img201.imageshack.us/img201/1982/rockcrabs.png[/img] [img]http://img824.imageshack.us/img824/3831/pestcontrolo.png[/img] [img]http://img24.imageshack.us/img24/134/kbdy.png[/img] [img]http://img259.imageshack.us/img259/1899/huntingf.png[/img] [img]http://img811.imageshack.us/img811/1418/cursesl.png[/img] [img]http://img689.imageshack.us/img689/5377/corporalbeast.png[/img] [img]http://img15.imageshack.us/img15/7103/controlpanelb.png[/img] [img]http://img141.imageshack.us/img141/8164/barrelchest.png[/img] [img]http://img835.imageshack.us/img835/7575/summoningo.png[/img] [img]http://img27.imageshack.us/img27/5820/playersg.png[/img] [img]http://img818.imageshack.us/img818/7098/nomadx.png[/img] [img]http://img834.imageshack.us/img834/5552/newitemsd.png[/img] [img]http://img822.imageshack.us/img822/9837/dungeoneeringj.png[/img] [img]http://img843.imageshack.us/img843/833/bossesf.png[/img][/center] Please note that photos containing the DeltaInsanity and Delta_Insanity logo and text are not copied from another server if anyone wants to imply that, they are from our world 2 which is running off the same source, hence why I used the photos in this thread. I was told to add media otherwise this thread would be removed so </3.... I was also told to add some features and to describe things about the server so here that is.
[size=36pt]TO ANYONE WANTING TO APPLY! READ THIS![/size] [center] [size=24pt][anchor=staff]Staff List[/size] [size=8pt]NOTE:Things marked with an asterisk(*) means that the position is open. [/size] [b]Founders[/b] [img]http://img594.imageshack.us/img594/2259/foundercrown.png[/img]Brandon [img]http://img594.imageshack.us/img594/2259/foundercrown.png[/img]Saige
[b]Website Developers[/b] Brandon -Head Developer Sk8r - Website Developer * - Website Developer * - Website Developer
[b]Java Development Team[/b] [img]http://img72.imageshack.us/img72/8062/javadevelopers.png[/img]Saige - Head Developer [img]http://img72.imageshack.us/img72/8062/javadevelopers.png[/img]Brandon [img]http://img72.imageshack.us/img72/8062/javadevelopers.png[/img]Jake - Java Developer [img]http://img72.imageshack.us/img72/8062/javadevelopers.png[/img]* - Java Developer
[b][img]http://images.wikia.com/mechscape/images/3/31/Jmod_crown.png[/img]Administrators[img]http://images.wikia.com/mechscape/images/3/31/Jmod_crown.png[/img][/b] [img]http://images.wikia.com/mechscape/images/3/31/Jmod_crown.png[/img]Daniel - Head Administrator [img]http://images.wikia.com/mechscape/images/3/31/Jmod_crown.png[/img]* - Administrator [img]http://images.wikia.com/mechscape/images/3/31/Jmod_crown.png[/img]* - Administrator
[b][img]http://i.imgur.com/Died3.gif[/img]Global Moderators[img]http://i.imgur.com/Died3.gif[/img][/b] [img]http://i.imgur.com/Died3.gif[/img]Rocky - Moderator [img]http://i.imgur.com/Died3.gif[/img]* - Moderator [img]http://i.imgur.com/Died3.gif[/img]* - Moderator [img]http://i.imgur.com/Died3.gif[/img]* - Moderator
[img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/Themes/core/images/im_off.gif[/img]Forum Staff[img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/Themes/core/images/im_off.gif[/img] [img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/Themes/core/images/im_off.gif[/img][s]Peanut[/s]Temporarily Resigned - Forum Manager [img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/Themes/core/images/im_off.gif[/img]* - Forums [img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/Themes/core/images/im_off.gif[/img]* - Forums [img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/Themes/core/images/im_off.gif[/img]* - Forums[/center] [size=14pt][color=red]We have a VPS! Running on really good specs: 4GB RAM 3.10Ghz Processor (AMD Athlon II X2 225) Windows 7 OS Windows rating: 5.0/5.0!! We are getting a new domain and we have the website, webclient and new cache all ready to be put on the website which should be ready with moderator approval of the link! I am also releasing a BETA before any of our ex-team members do. [center][anchor=features][img]http://img10.imageshack.us/img10/8117/featuresp.png[/img][/center] -639 Skill Interface -Added Curses. -Great Bridding / Switching System -Vote4Cash Command -Webclient Ready -Soulwars Cape -Torva and Pernix -Critical Hits -Fixed Slayer -Ring of Life Effects -Skillcape Emotes -602 Animations and 614 Items, 317 NPCS -New Rendering Methods for textures -Fun PK -Chaotic Item Sets -Dungeoneering Teleport GFX including use of Kinship Ring -Updated Maps -614 Items -Korasi Sword -And anything else seen in the pictures that isnt mentioned here. :p The reason I thought that people would like to apply for this team is because here at ProjectC✘R we are all about professionalism and being here for users to quench there gaming thirst.
[anchor=template][center][b]To apply for anything use this template.[/b][/center] NOTE: PLEASE STICK TO THE TEMPLATE AS IT IS EASIER FOR ME TO ACCEPT YOUR APPLICATION! [center][code]Nickname: Age: MSN or Skype name: Country: Timezone: Position applying for: Past experience: Why do you want to apply for this position?: Hours available per day:[/code][/center]
[center][size=36pt][anchor=message]Dear Flamers/Haters:[/size][/center] To all you people claiming this server is a leech, well this is only just the beginning, why the hell do you think im looking for a development team? To just talk to and own a server? No! To improve the server and its features to help users quench there runescape private server thirst! So think next time when you call a development team threads products a big massive leech. Think why the hell there posting the thread in the first place. Peace out haters, In other words, get the fuck out of this thread Mohd123.[removed meme abuse] [anchor=contact] [img]http://img195.imageshack.us/img195/8757/requirementsf.png[/img] [table] [tr] [td][/td] [/tr] [/table]

item.title: Project-C✘R
item.dc:creator: @Salayer Salayer
item.description:
@Salayer wrote:

Nickname: Salayer
Age:16
MSN or Skype name: IsOWierd
Country: United States of America
Timezone:Central Timezone
Position applying for: Moderator
Past experience: I have been around for many server. In the past I have coded some. Work with GFX a little done some Website help. I have been Admin on numerous of servers, and also I have been moderator. I know what it takes to do what I have to do.
Why do you want to apply for this position?: Me being honest I just decided to come back to rsps, and I decided I should help out as much as possible
Hours available per day:8:00 am to 12:00 am

item.title: Project-C✘R
item.dc:creator: @I_am_beast I am beast
item.description:
@I_am_beast wrote:

[center]Nickname:
Jordan

Age:
17 years

MSN or Skype name:
MSN: jordan.patterson@live.com
Skype: jordan321321321

Country:
United States of 'Murica

Timezone:
Central Standard Time (GMT -6)

Position applying for:
Administrator (Primary Choice)
Global Moderator (Secondary Choice)

Past experience:
I have coded as well as owned a successful server. I have been a moderator on many different servers, some of which include, but are not limited to; Zarpor, Rune Legacy, as well as RoxoScape. I have just come back from playing WoW Private servers where I was a GM on the WoW private server, “Eternion-WoW,” If you know what that is.

Why do you want to apply for this position?:
I would like to apply for the position of Administrator, because I feel as though I would make a great addition to the staff team. I am well versed with all types of situations, and will be able to handle a lot more than a normal user may be able to. I work well with peers as well as under pressure. I am able to enforce rules while keeping a calm and level headed attitude towards the entire situation. I plan on majoring in business management in college, because of my love of the management position. I am able to oversee many different aspects of the management steps that need to be taken. The server source looks great, and it would be a great honor if I was able to help things run smoothly for all players.

Hours available per day:
This depends. I work some days, and I don’t work others. I will be available for a time not to depress below 3 hours,
and having no maximum. Usually I am available for 6 hours a day.

Thanks for reading!
Ciao
-Jordan[/center]

Read full topic

We don’t want our server to be boring without all the new items and maps that are coming in.[/quote]
